## Importing data

```{r}
fire <- read.csv("data/GlobalTemperatures.csv", header = TRUE, stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
fire$dt <- as.Date(fire$dt)
dim(fire)
range <- 3000:3192
plot(fire$dt[range], fire$LandAverageTemperature[range])
```
